1049490.name: Trysaria
1049490.description:
Trysaria is an adventure game that features retro graphics and traditional RPG mechanics as seen in games from the 90's era.

We invite you to explore the sprawling, mysterious, and eponymous world of Trysaria. You will battle fierce and deadly monsters for rare treasures and save struggling citizens in vibrant cities and plains across the world. If you get tired of being a Hero you can always go to an inn and gamble your gold (and time) away or just relax and eat a hot meal.


Explore the vast world of Trysaria: walk, run, swim or roll. Help Fain traverse the Dirva Forest, Red Rock Mountains, Orcea Highlands to Caliban Qamar Desert and explore deep into the caverns and dungeons. All while visiting the small village of Red Rock or the City of Neanderthal!



Fight enemies of all types: Notorious beasts, creatures, and powerful bosses. Equipped with powerful skills, Fain will be able to perform powerful attacks.

Axe's have a chance to hit from behind, being there swing is large.

Blast your foes from afar with deadly ranged attacks! Yes, that's right Fain has trained with a Bow since he was little.

WHAT!? Swords, Axes, Spears & Bows are not your taste.
Okay about some Magic? Learn to read Tomes and cast powerful spells from Wizards and Witches!


Find and collect many different swords, axes, and bows, granting Fain a variety of weapons to defeat even the strongest of foes. The world of Trysaria is buried with hidden secrets new and old, build Fain's magical knowledge to help gain access to forgotten magic.
Collectables? Of course, Trysaria is a world of many things and collectibles are one of them. Hunt for up to three different types of collectibles scattered all over the world.




Craft various weapon types at any blacksmith location around the world.

Swords, Axes, Daggers and so much more.


Do you need to heal? How about some freshly cooked fish or chicken?
These cooking pots will help aid you along your adventure with freshly cooked food.

Berries?

Everything you do in Trysaria has an effect on your character; you decide how your character progresses! Do you want to become an expert lumberjack? A carpenter? Or would you rather brave dark and dangerous mines for the largest gold ores you can find? Everything you do will make you stronger, but be warned – not every life is the same as the one before! Your character might grow in ways that surprise you.

You can do all of this and so much more in the world of TRYSARIA!

Single-player
Customize your hero with an array of various weapon and item combinations.
Beautiful retro pixel-art and animations.
Emotional music and ambient sounds breath life into the world.
Brave dangerous dungeons for rare treasures and gold.
Fight “Notorious Beasts” that only appear at set times! Can you find and defeat them?
Challenging quests for epic adventures.
Full controller support

*Trysaria is unfinished and is still in development, this is an early access phase and we will be working as hard as we can to push out weekly to monthly updates.*

Trysaria Questionnaire


Alcohol Reference, Fantasy Violence, Mild Language
Not an official rating!
